Trade/Device Name(s): Fastep S10 hCG Serum/Urine Combo Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Fastep S10 hCG Serum/Urine Combo Test, a prescription use rapid visual immunoassay for hCG detection in serum or urine to aid in early pregnancy detection.
Indications for Use Summary: A rapid visual immunoassay for qualitative, presumptive detection of human chorionic gonadotropin in human urine or serum as an aid in early pregnancy detection; for prescription use in clinical laboratories and not for point-of-care use.
